entities.description: The month in which the respondent first used an inhalant.
Indicates if the respondent used inhalants within the past year.
The total number of days the respondent used inhalants in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the frequency data was trimmed based on certain criteria.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the month they first used an inhalant.
Indicates if the respondent used inhalants in the past year.
Indicates the frequency of inhalant use by the respondent in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the inhalant use frequency data was trimmed.
